data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Domagnano a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Domagnano, San Marino
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 3,600 souls living in the state of Domagnano with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Domagnano who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Domagnano to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, help 7 new simple churches start among the 3,600 people in the state of Domagnano, San Marino. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Domagnano, San Marino to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Domagnano, San Marino.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
